Building a Better Tomorrow
“By broadening our sustainability strategy to a global ESG 
platform, we can make an even greater impact on the 
communities we serve. It’s a commitment inspired by our 
company purpose, Powering Positive Change™ – our steadfast 
belief that, by constantly improving ourselves, we help create a 
better future for our planet, our stakeholders and our business.”
Jeff Waters
Chief Executive Officer  
Maxeon Solar Technologies
